sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialog } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-popup', templateUrl: './popup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./popup.component.css'] }) export class PopupComponent { constructor( private dialog: MatDialog ){} stockc= new FormControl('',[ Validators.required ]) brandc= new FormControl('',[ Validators.required ]) pricec= new FormControl('',[ Validators.required ]) itemNamec= new FormControl('',[ Validators.required ]) dateEnteredc= new FormControl('',[ Validators.required ]) onClose(){ this.dialog.closeAll() } }
